title: Truth behind Khloe Kardashian's changing nose as she insists it's clever make-up not surgery
text:

Khloe Kardashian has been the subject of intense speculation about her nose and whether she has had any cosmetic work done to it.

The 35-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has often hit back at trolls who have accused her of changing the way she looks through surgery.

It is a claim that has been levelled at many of the Kardashian and Jenner sisters, which haven't been denied in the most part by them but Khloe has often been the one who is different and tried to stay true to her natural self.

What is for certain is that Khloe has undergone some physical changes in her lifetime and these have seemingly become more apparent since she divorced her ex husband Lamar Odom and the birth of her daughter True, in 2018.

(Image: Eric Charbonneau/REX/Shutterstoc)

(Image: khloe kardashian/Instagram)

During this time, Khloe turned to challenging daily workouts to help her body and mind and this resulted in her having significant weight loss.

Khloe dabbled with cosmetic surgery and had lip filler injections but the response online was so negative that she has shied away from having any more work done.

Speaking about the speculation, the reality star said that she was still considering work on her nose but it was makeup making the difference now.

(Image: Instagram)

She said: "One day I think I’ll get one because I think about it every day. But I’m scared so, for now, it’s all about contour."

How she is making her nose look 'thinner' has been dismissed by fans, who refuse to believe that she hasn't gone under the knife.

Fans of the reality star have been critical when she has seemingly turned to photoshop to manipulate images, especially when the Kardashian family make claims of being "real".

(Image: Instagram)

So, the state of Khloe's nose has fallen into one of three categories, whether it has been changed cosmetically, digitally enhanced or, as Khloe has claimed, been contoured by expert make up artists.

description: Khloe Kardashian has been the subject to plenty of jibes and trolls over her 'changing nose', which she has often spoken out about
